title: The Source Presents Hip Hop Hits Volume 7 (2003) 320kbps
description:
Album Info 

The seventh installment in The Source's HIP HOP HITS series once again delivers the goods with a set of fierce tracks. Source Presents: Hip Hop Hits, Vol. 7 buy CD music Ludacris races out of the gates with his revved-up 2 FAST 2 FURIOUS soundtrack contribution, "Act a Fool." Snoop Dogg brings his nonchalant swagger to the soul-tinged "Beautiful," while 2Pac is represented by a posthumous track that features breakout R&B singer Anthony Hamilton. Even Though Nelly's "Air Force Ones" Bone Crusher's remix of "Neva Scared", and David Banner's "Like a Pimp" eat up over a quarter of the album, it seems like there aren't enough Southern hits by half. Nevertheless, the disc does tend to stick to the tracks that were most popular, appealing most to those who haven't picked up many full-lengths -- there's Missy Elliott's "Work It," DMX's "Where the Hood At," and Lil' Kim's "The Jump Off" as well. 


Track Listing 

1. Act A Fool - Ludacris
2. Beautiful - Snoop Dogg, Pharrell Williams and Charlie Wilson
3. Thugz Mansion - 2Pac and Anthony Hamilton
4. Air Force Ones - Nelly, Kyjuan and Murphy Lee
5. The Jump Off - Lil' Kim and Mr. Cheeks
6. Can't Let You Go - Fabolous and Lil' Mo
7. Rock The Party - Benzino
8. Where The Hood At - DMX
9. Never Scared - Bone Crusher, Busta Rhymes and Jadakiss
10. Like A Pimp - Lil' Flip and David Banner
11. Mesmerize - Ja Rule and Ashanti
12. Luv U Better - LL Cool J
13. Beware of the Boys (Jay-Z Remix) - Jay-Z and Panjabi MC
14. Work It - Missy Elliott
15. Bonus Track: Untouchable - Benzino and Untouchables
